title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan together in a bowl.
Drain pasta and mix with pancetta, then stir in the egg mixture off the heat.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked.
In a pan, cook onions until golden, then add tomato puree and simmer.
Add cream and grilled chicken to the sauce, simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
